pages.text: $(li)The Outback Leggings are a bit better than the $(l:patchouli:armors/phantom_armor)Phantom Leggings$(/l).$(br)$(li)They have Armour Toughness giving you extra protection from strong attacks.

pages.name: Outback Leggings
pages.text: This piece of armor offers a small probability of avoiding projectile attacks such as $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l).
